I bought the shirt as a gift. I was surprised, the shirt is more of a woven fabric, Doesn't look cheap and fits as sized. Lg 5"11 202lb male
This is the exact type of shirt my son wanted for a trip to Spain. Thankfully, it arrived quickly and was great quality. Son washes it and lays it flat to dry and it looks as good as new.
Great looking shirt, true to size. Comfortable, baby blue looks great, material is nice!

The fit of this shirt from COOFANDY cannot be any better, the quality, the way the sizing runs is on point from A-to-Z. I love this shirt for many occasions.
Fits nicely, love the style, breathable, comfortable, love the color, material thickness and washability.

Fits him nice but washing was not as expected with material. Cool wash, came out crinkled enough where I had to use warm iron. Wash again hoping it was just first wash, same thing.

评论概述: la talla es ligeramente grande, la horma es buena como en la foto. la calidad es decente.
评论详情: Adquirí esta camisa y, en general, estoy satisfecho. Si bien la talla es un poco más grande de lo esperado, la horma es favorecedora y se ajusta bien al cuerpo. La calidad del material es aceptable para el precio. Es una prenda versátil que puedo usar en diversas ocasiones. Volveria a comprar
Great value! Flattering. True to size.
It's made well and fits great .
My teenage son loved it
Looked 👍  Good
Get with the program people!  There are more short men than you’d like to admit.
Loved this shirt for my Dad who usually wears an XL but he is built with a “Santa tummy” and it was very tight in that region.

I def like the style of the shirt but I wasn't to excited about the fit. I ordered a small but it didn't fit as snuggly as I had hoped for. So I had to change my look just a little bit. I just put on a white tee shirt and wore the shirt open. My wife loved the alternative look so i have to say, it was still worth the money.

I’m 5’10, 190 lbs. Size large and the shirt fits well. Tight around the arms and loose around the midsection. I have a bit of a gut and the shirt hides it well. Only wore it twice so far and got compliments both times. Also bought it in brown.
I purchased five shirts and all 4xl. They were large at best. My 3xl shirts are two times larger.
Buenas calidad pero es más pequeño de lo esperado
came with lots of wrinkles
I bought this for my son and I love it but he doesn't like that it's so see through. It says knit you just can't totally tell from the pics how translucent it is.
Holds it's shape and fits well.

Purchased this for my husband to wear for our baby shower. The pink was perfect and neutral, not too bright. The material and breathability made having a baby shower in the hot Texas summer not so bad. Well made and true to size. Has been washed with no snags or shrinkage.
This is the third different color that I purchased and at great price.
Perfect size, great quality!
Textura y talle perfecto
Loved the fit and the material is great quality!
Size was so small for what I ordered

My hubby love this shirt. The model is young — so I wasn’t sure how the shirt would look on my hubby, who’s older. But the cut and fabric of the shirt looks amazing! Hope to buy more for him in other colors!
It’s a very nice shirt, but had a funny smell when I open up the package
This is the second one of these shirts that I have ordered and i love both of them, good fit and feel.

This purchase was made because someone admired the style. After receiving the item the recipient was very satisfied and appreciated the value.
Hubby didn't like so it was returned.  The quality was okay, but he wasn't crazy about the style or fabric and it definitely ran a bit small overall.

The shirt fits well and is true to size. The material is of decent quality. The issue with the product is the seller may not send the correct product, multiple times. In addition to not meeting standard shipping deadlines. I would recommend purchasing this shirt from another seller! No customer service.
Bought this for my husband for white night on a cruise.  It was a great look and fit.  Good quality
Nice semi-casual shirt for the summer.

I usually struggle deciding between L and XL with my dimensions of 6’2/215lbs. Went with Large and glad I did. As for fit, this shirt sits perfectly below my waist, sleeves lightly hug my biceps nicely, and there’s a decent amount of give in the stomach to hide a small belly. Looks better snug than loose IMO. 5/5 for fit. Recommend ordering your size to a size down for a fitted look.  Material as expected. It is the warm knit cotton blend but does not bother my skin. Lightweight, and the holes in the design are nowhere near too big. Love the design and look. Highly recommend for those into this fitted fashion style  Have yet to wash the shirt so I’ll see how it holds up after and see to update the review.
Size chart accurate ,color is white ,unique design as a sweater shirt. Lightweight comfortable plenty of stretch

The color is great but I've ordered shirts like this in XL and they fit perfectly but this shirt is an XL but is tight. Will reorder hoping it will be correct
Material is not great.
Good color, size true.

评论概述: Looks nice enough but won't last

Normally ordering online  can be tricky however everything listed about this shirt was on point. Quality looking good fit great price and looks nice.
Wore to a Summer reunion event... I received lots of praise for my sense of style!
So comfortable & great fit
Not too good quality.
The fabric is so cheap that it bunches up around the neck and shoulders and poofs up when you sit, it’s almost like wearing a starchy burlap sack for a shirt. Very very cheaply made

The shirts are real nice quality. I read some of the reviews and based on other buyer with similar measurements, I thought I would be fine with a LG. I also used the size chart for the purchase and my chest size was the right fit. I believe an XL or maybe even a XXL would have been better just because I like my shirts to fit tight in the arms but loose around the midsection.

This is a nice knit shirt. It is fairly thin though and has some little holes in the fabric, probably need an under shirt with it. I like how it has a little collar and buttons down all the way to the bottom. I also like that it is straight cut across the bottom. It is very breathable and the fit is pretty decent. It is tighter around the arms than the chest or stomach. I got a medium size shirt, I am 5'9" and 165 pounds. The design looks nice as well.
Thought it would be different..no happy with item..returned 3 weeks ago and havent gotten money back
Fit is as intended. Would recommend.
Came as small size.too tight
fits great, good quality for the price, i purchased 4 more.

评论用户: I ordered a white shirt but I received a cream shirt. Very disappointed.

评论详情: Really liked the shirt and will definitely get one or two more in different colors.
speedy delivery good fit nice color

I like the fit. I have an athletic build; 6ft, 210-213, 48in chest, 32in waist, and the shirt fit well across my body. It’s form fitting but still has room to stretch in the chest and arms and it tapers well through the abdomen. My only complaint is the color. It’s beige but appears more yellow in some areas than others. Hopefully a few wash cycles will even things out. Even so, it still matches nicely with my white linen pants and navy chino shorts.  Overall, this is a good inexpensive addition to the wardrobe if looking for a lightweight Summer “old money” aesthetic. I like this shirt with the white linen pants and a pair of light brown Birkenstocks or dressed up a bit with navy chino shorts and a tan driving loafer.
I love this shirt! It's very soft and fine quality. The only thing is it's a bit short for me, as I'm 6'3" but it'll do for the average human.
Highly recommend!
I love it . It fits perfectly
I purchased this shirt for my son. It has great quality and appearance. I was pleasantly surprised, and I would recommend it to anyone who likes this style of shirt.
Love the fit, the color, and the fabric. Coofandy definitely does not miss!
Fit is great light and soft to the skin

This shirt was worn to an outdoor beach bar event in which my husband was hesitant because of the pinkish color. This was one of two pin colored shirts I ordered for him. This one was actually perfect because with the year-round hot weather in the 80s, the shirt offered some built in air conditioning because of the tiny holes throughout the shirt. It allowed him to stay cooler than the other guys who perspired through their shirts that was seen but my hubby's didn't reveal any perspiration whatsoever.

Crafted from a soft and breathable fabric, the shirt provides all-day comfort. It feels light on the skin, making it ideal for warmer weather or layering during cooler seasons. The attention to detail in the stitching and overall construction adds to the quality feel of the garment.  The fit is true to size, providing a flattering silhouette without being overly tight. It complements different body types, ensuring a comfortable and confident wear. This is a decent shirt, it has been great so far however after each wash, I see the color fades a little
Good quality and comfortable.
Very stylish summer shirt. Really shows off my physique from working out. Definitely will buy more.

评论概述: So nice in fit and fashion
评论详情: I got the green version of this shirt. It is in a knitted fabric that is lightweight and stays in shape, even after washing.  You can either buy it a size up so you can have a relaxed look or buy it in the size you need for a fitted look.  I also like wearing it unbuttoned and open with a nice t-shirt underneath
the color stands out and the material is rich and smooth. you don't have to worry about ironing this shirt.

评论概述: Great Brand at a Great Price
评论详情: When buying shirts on Amazon, Coofandy tends to be my go-to.  Every shirt of theirs that I've bought has been true-quality and impressed me.  Great fabrics, great fit, and beautiful styling.  Shirts always look way more expensive than they are.  Just make sure to check the sizing.  Getting the right size makes a huge difference.  A tad too big, looks sloppy, a tad too small looks cheezy.  Most shirts, the wrinkles from the packaging come out easily.

I get it; it's a beach shirt.  As such, the weave on this is fairly 'open'.  In the Amazon photo, you can't really see that but when it's on, the holes in the weave make it quite 'breezy'.  I'm also not crazy about the texture of the material; it's fairly thick.

This is a beautiful shirt and can make a man look even more handsome. The light green color is very soothing. The fabric is soft. The design of the weave is great. All-in-all, a very nice shirt. Just the thing to wear in warm or hot weather, tucked or untucked.  The ordered shirt size was true to form. So no need to order a size larger.

I love the stretchy knit Rayon/Polyester blend material.  This is one of my favorite shirts to wear.  It hangs really well, and looks good on me.  Sizing was very accurate and it has gone through the wash several times without fading.  They recommend no tumble dry, so I just let it air dry on a hanger.  Breathes really well and is a summer shirt for sure.  Price is really good too.  Highly recommend.

This is a very nice Summer shirt made of soft, stretchable cotton. Mine was very comfortable and breathable so, I am looking forward to the warmer seasons were I can wear it.  It is an attractive style and appears to be well made with very good stitching. I would not mind have a couple more of these in different colors.  The sizing was great and the shirt was a little roomy just as I like.  Hopefully, this review was helpful to you.

Great quality shirt. The material has good weight to it but is still soft. I love that it has a vintage flair to it. There are holes in it so you might want to wear an undershirt but I plan to wear it to the beach.

Described as a "knit" shirt, it's better described as a macramé shirt. Not a tightly weaved shirt. I like it and I like the look too. Very airy, making it a great beach shirt, though making you the best dressed at the beach.  The XL fit is fine. Do I have a worry of snags, though haven't had one so far? Easy recommendation.

Got these shirt to prep for the super summer heat in Texas. I ordered my normal size, but this shirt fits more closer than I'd like. That said the material is stretchy and breathable. If I leave the shirt unbutton and open it looks and feel much better. Might be alittle loose fit once I wash it. Overall I do like it.

评论概述: lightweight, soft and oh so stretchy
评论详情: The material is so stretchy I didn't have to open the buttons to take it off (too lazy?).  All stitching seems good, buttons attached well, and you even get a spare button.  I like the pattern but be aware that the "cable" design is actually an open stitch that is a bit see-thru.  I don't have a body like the model, so my "dad bod" may show a little more than it should (time for a diet?).  Watch the sizes because they seem to run large according to the chart.  There are a lot more colors available than a lot of the similar shirts.  I ordered the light green which pretty much matches the photo.  I like that the knit pattern is a little different than others.  This is a nice summer shirt and it has the same quality as other products from this vendor.

评论概述: great quality but kind of see through
评论详情: I love the fitment of this product on me. It fits me great and I love how I look in it. One thing I did not like about the shirt was that it had little holes that show skin. It is not that big of a problem for me because I make sure to put on a tank top under the shirt, so that my skin does not show.

This is a sweater top and the material feels great and is on the warmer side except for the breezy design holes. Fits somewhat longer on my husband that is on the shorter side. An undershirt would be necessary for a more formal setting. The shirt and hubby are huggable.
This is a really nice shirt, great quality and perfect for the summer or a nice hot vacation. It can be dressed up or down. I would buy this in other colors.

Knit material is pretty durable and comfortable to wear. Light enough even to wear in direct sunlight.  The colors they come in are ideal for South Florida. Pretty nice value and it fits as I expected.

This is a shirt for a warm summer day. It is lightweight, soft, and very cool to wear. Even just walking around in my home I can feel air flow through it. It also hangs very nicely on me, even my kids think so. So quite happy with it.

评论概述: Check measurements, slightly smaller than US sizes.
评论详情: This is a nice fitting shirt, I had to size up. I normally wear XL, but the XL for this shirt is smaller than average US XL, but the XXL for its too large to be a standard XL. The sleeves hug the arms and sit around mid bicep. But the chest and midsection is slightly too large for me. Take a close look at the provided sizes to make sure the measurements suit you.  It's a nice feeling fabric, but has small holes in it through out as part of the decoration of the fabric which is not apparent in the stock photos. Also seems more ornate and decorative in person.  Collar sits completely flat, not like a a standard polo/button up, and smaller than normal button up collars.  It's a unique design, but imo the shirt in the photos are not a completely accurate representation of the product received.

评论概述: The shirt has a great look and feel to it.
评论详情: I liked the look of the shirt and it felt soft to the touch.

评论概述: My son likes it my husband doesn’t
评论详情: I got this shirt for my husband who upon first look said he definitely was not going to wear this.  My son looked at it and said sure I’ll wear it.  My daughter was also trying to steal it.  So differences in taste.  My son tried it on and it’s a little baggy for him (I sized it for my husband). However it doesn’t look bad baggy.  The part where you see the holes are really holes that you can clearly see through.  It is not a super thin shirt, but you will want an undershirt if you wear it during the cooler months.  The collar lays flat and it has some buttons in the front.  It seems to be well made.

It's hard to see in the pictures on the ad and in the one I took, but the knit pattern is more open than it appears. Definitely not something you can wear in a professional setting without an undershirt of some type. The shirt itself is very light and fits very well. It's always difficult to find shirts that fit my shoulders correctly, and this one is nearly spot on where it should be. Along with being light, it is also super soft. Definitely a good summer and warm weather shirt.

This Knit Shirt is pretty comfortable to wear. The material is slightly heavier than I expected and is quite nice. This shirt could definitely be dressed up a little or worn casually at the beach. The fit was spot on and the quality of the shirt seems pretty well made. It made it through a standard wash and a delicate dry cycle. Overall, a very nice, high quality shirt. I can't wait until it warms up a bit to wear it.

While not all shirts wear the same, I was very pleased to find this shirt fit so well. Perfect fit, and it's not only comfortable to wear but it looks good as well. Tailored just as expected and a great value for the price. Highly recommend this shirt.
Very dressy looking but casual enough to wear with jeans, etc.  Very Happy

Got this for my husband and he absolutely love everything about this shirt from the soft comfortable material that has nice stretch to the fit Shirt fit just right on his 185lbs body and color is subtle but yet noticeable Can be dressed up or down for any occasion
Looks nice, but a bit too ladies apparel
